originalText.text: We have been at La Scuola for nearly 11 years now, and I could not be more pleased with the quality of education that my children continue to receive. They are challenged academically with a dual Italian and American curriculum, and my eldest is now perfectly bilingual, despite not speaking Italian regularly at home. Students benefit from small class sizes and a nurturing environment, which is also culturally diverse. The IB program at the upper levels will undoubtedly enrich the already exceptional education that La Scuola has provided thus far.

originalText.text: Our family has been part of the La Scuola community for five years. In our opinion La Scuola combines an incredible mix of academic rigor, nurturing environment and holistic approach to child development. We strongly feel La Scuola is unique in the New York City private schools scene thanks in no small part to its contemporary approach, yet remaining in touch with its European roots.

originalText.text: I have been a proud teacher at La Scuola d'Italia for the past nine years. The La Scuola community is made up of inquisitive, respectful, knowledgeable and caring learners, teachers, staff and families. Individuals are nurtured academically and holistically. They are encouraged and guided to develop a sense of self, love of learning, multilingual and cultural diversity, and inclusiveness towards others. They are given a safe space to grow their interests, confidence and discover their purpose to become global leaders who make the world a better place.

originalText.text: La Scuola d’Italia is a standout institution, seamlessly integrating bilingualism and cultural immersion into its curriculum. The school's commitment to academic excellence, diversity, and community engagement fosters a nurturing environment for both students and educators. As a teacher with many years at La Scuola, I've experienced firsthand the positive impact on students' development. La Scuola is not just a school; it's a community that instills a love for learning and a sense of global citizenship.

originalText.text: I am extremely satisfied with my experience at Scuola d'Italia in New York. Its international and bilingual atmosphere in Italian has provided a stimulating and inclusive educational environment. The competent and passionate teachers made the learning process engaging, fostering a deep understanding of International and Italian culture. I highly recommend this school for quality education and an enriching cultural experience.
